request.description: Gets paginated data for the editable view o a package
Gets a list of change types available for a package
Changes the description of the package
Resets all records in this package, dismissing all changes
Changes the status of a package: e.g. transitioning to "submit for review", "reject", "approve"

Opens a new session for this user and package type.
This Postman call will store the session token for subsequent calls. You must implement this in your own app.

Closes a session.
This Postman call will reset the session token.
Gets the session token for a specific package type
Adds a new empty row
Resets one record in the package
Clones a record in the package
Soft deletes a record in the package
Reactivates a soft deleted record
Changes a value on a line (recordId) and column (columnId) in a given change package (packageChangeId).
Prints multiple labels for a thread type
